title: mirror configured during spack test is not cleaned up causing buildcache command to fail fetching spec.yaml file in it
body:
Whenever I install any Spack package, I see the following message during installation:
```console
$ spack install zlib
==> 1184: Installing zlib
==> Finding buildcaches in /private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-2/test_ci_rebuild_basic0/working_dir/local_mirror/build_cache
==> Fetching file:///private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-2/test_ci_rebuild_basic0/working_dir/local_mirror/build_cache/darwin-catalina-ivybridge-gcc-9.2.0-zlib-1.2.11-3svy7xryk3dwdoxzjwc6e7wpfiuixutw.spec.yaml
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-2/test_ci_rebuild_basic0/working_dir/local_mirror/build_cache/darwin-catalina-ivybridge-gcc-9.2.0-zlib-1.2.11-3svy7xryk3dwdoxzjwc6e7wpfiuixutw.spec.yaml
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: file:///private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-2/test_ci_rebuild_basic0/working_dir/local_mirror/build_cache/darwin-catalina-ivybridge-gcc-9.2.0-zlib-1.2.11-3svy7xryk3dwdoxzjwc6e7wpfiuixutw.spec.yaml
    Curl failed with error 37
==> Fetching from file:///private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-2/test_ci_rebuild_basic0/working_dir/local_mirror/build_cache/darwin-catalina-ivybridge-gcc-9.2.0-zlib-1.2.11-3svy7xryk3dwdoxzjwc6e7wpfiuixutw.spec.yaml failed.
```
I'm not trying to use buildcaches, and this error message shouldn't be reported. I think this might be due to a file leftover during `spack test`.

### Spack version

```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-149-6412b9e71a
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install zlib
```
Possibly after running `spack test`, or hitting <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>C</kbd> during `spack test`.
